column4:
['Yeh motu are baapare baap ye chhotu', '
Yeh motu ye chhotu haan', '
Madam haan madam', '
Kaam karo kaam karake salaam', '
Subah aur shaam tum ho gulaam', '
Haan hum hain gulaam', '
Yeh motu ha ye chhotu ha', '
Haan madam haan madam', '
Kaam karo kaam karake salaam', '
Subah aur shaam tum ho gulaam', '
Haan haan hum hain gulaam', '
Jo chaahe karawaalo jo chaahe manwaalo', '
Hum toh huzoor yahaan bike bina daan', '
Jo chaahe karawaalo jo chaahe manwaalo', '
Hum toh huzoor yahaan bike bina daan', '
Ho tum ho gulaam haan hum hain gulaam', 'Ma ma ma motu tu hai kaun tu hai kaun', '
Bak bak chhodo na chalegi chaturaai', '
Jhaadu uthaao karo pehale safaayi', '
Mujhe mat dekho are lid uthaakar phenko', '
Are are are chhi chhi', 'Yeh kya hai akal nahi gadhe ko', '
Achchha jaao ghaas chana laao', '
Ghodo ko khilaao paani pilaao', '
Maalish karo aur paalish karo', '
Kaamchori ki toh jeena kar dungi haraam', '
Ho tum ho gulaam ha hum hain gulaam', '
Ye motu yes yes madam', '
Ye chotu present madam', '
Yeh motu ye chhotu haan', '
Madam haan madam', '
Kaam karo kaam karake salaam', '
Subah aur shaam tum ho gulaam', '
Haan haan hum hain gulaam', 'Ruk nahi jaana kahin thak nahi jaana', '
Roti khaani hai toh hoga khun jalana', '
Juldi karo nahi toh hogi pitaayi', 'Taange tod dungi ya sar phod dungi', '
Chamadi udhedake kahin chhod dungi', '
Baatein meri na maani toh', '
Beimaani ki toh hoga bura anjaam', '
Baatein meri na maani toh', '
Beimaani ki toh hoga bura anjaam', '
Ho tum ho gulaam ha hum hain gulaam', '
Yeh motu ye chhotu are', '
Baaba kitana maarogi', '
Yeh motu ye chhotu ha', '
Madam ha ha madam', '
Kaam karo kaam karake salaam', '
Subah aur shaam tum ho gulaam', '
Haan hum hain gulaam', '
Zameen mein gadawa do ya zinda jala do', '
Hum toh huzoor yaha bike bina daan', '
Zameen mein gadawa do ya zinda jala do', '
Hum toh huzoor yaha bike bina daan', '
Ho tum ho gulaam ha hum hain gulaam.']
